data.enText: a group of animals of the same type that live and feed together
a large group of people of the same type

data.chText: 她从一群午餐时饮酒的人中间挤了过去。
data.enText: She pushed her way through a herd of lunchtime drinkers.
Why follow the herd (= do and think the same as everyone else) ?

data.chText: 监视；对某人 / 某物严加控制
data.enText: to keep watch or control over sb/sth

data.chText: 警方监视着街上成群结队的年轻人
data.enText: police riding herd on crowds of youths on the streets
to move or make sb/sth move in a particular direction

data.chText: 我们全都涌上了公共汽车。
data.enText: We all herded on to the bus.

data.chText: 他们被一起赶上卡车开走了。
data.enText: They were herded together into trucks and driven away.
to make animals move together as a group

data.chText: 监视；对某人 / 某物严加控制
data.enText: to keep watch or control over sb/sth

data.chText: 警方监视着街上成群结队的年轻人
data.enText: police riding herd on crowds of youths on the streets

tr: a group of cattle or sheep or other domestic mammals all of the same kind that are herded by humans
a group of wild mammals of one species that remain together: antelope or elephants or seals or whales or zebra
a crowd especially of ordinary or undistinguished persons or things
example: his brilliance raised him above the ruck
the children resembled a fairy herd

tr: cause to herd, drive, or crowd together
example: We herded the children into a spare classroom
Who will be herding the cattle when the cowboy dies?

value.def: A herd is a large group of animals of one kind that live together.
If you say that someone has joined the herd or follows the herd, you are criticizing them because you think that they behave just like everyone else and do not think for themselves.

example.ex: They are individuals; they will not follow the herd.
example.tran: 他们是独立的个体，不愿随大溜。

value.tran: （缺乏独立思想的）一般民众，芸芸众生

value.def: If you herd people somewhere, you make them move there in a group.

example.ex: He began to herd the prisoners out...
example.tran: 他开始将犯人集中在一起赶出来。

example.ex: The group was herded into a bus.
example.tran: 这群人被赶上了一辆公共汽车。

value.tran: 使集在一起;把…赶在一起

value.def: If you herd animals, you make them move along as a group.

example.ex: Stefano used a motor cycle to herd the sheep...
example.tran: 斯特凡诺骑一辆摩托车放羊。

example.ex: A boy herded half a dozen camels down towards the water trough.
example.tran: 一个男孩赶着6头骆驼朝饮水槽走去。

trans: 群体本能(人或动物在行为或思维上从众的自然趋势)
